- - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Eugene, Please find updated estimate attached that shoe 1 dependent. You would enter your expenses into our online system as you incurred t hem and then we would apply them to the next available payment for a tax deduction. Thanks!Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Eugene Tipen [mailto:etipenko@gmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, April 11, 2012 2:02 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: net cash Hi Sara,
Hope you doing well,
could you please let me know how this "Net Cash" spreadsheet may change if we add one dependent: my daughter, living with me. and one more question: how often can I submit my expenses (weekly/monthly? ).
Thank you for your help and consideration
Sincerely Eugene TipenkoOn Thu, Apr 5, 2012 at 5:21 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com> wrote: ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
